ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
6 Cameras: 1/3" SONY CCD, 600 TV lines, 36 IR LEDs, Vari-Focal 3.5~8mm Lens. Indoor dome camera. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range).
8 Channel H.264 DVR with 2TB HDD: 960H & D1 960×480 & 30FPS. 8CH D1 Real-Time Recroding & Playback, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs, 2 USB port for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Real Time Recording+ Playback, 6 Sony CCD Cameras 600 TVL 36 IR LEDs Vari-Focal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
